name: Dodgy (Hussain Lohawala)
description:
Hey Internet!

This a 3D game made in Unity3D. In this game the players have to collide with as many green objects as possible and destroy them to get points in a certain time duration. However if they happen to collide with red objects then they will loose the same magnitude of points as well!

The controls of the game can be found here: https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/73359258/147792070-1223c7dc-225d-4575-95b2-656b35b51f90.png

The installation is explained here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-B3bMvr-8mksYFIwwjWaqVr0-EYJU_JG/view?usp=sharing

Happy Gaming!
